org.gradoop.flink.model.api.epgm

Interface BaseGraphFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - type of the graph head
    V - the vertex type
    E - the edge type
    LG - the type of the logical graph that will be created with this factory
    GC - the type of the according graph collection
    All Superinterfaces:
    ElementFactoryProvider<G,V,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogicalGraphFactory

    public interface BaseGraphFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>
extends ElementFactoryProvider<G,V,E>
    Factory interface that is responsible for creating instances of logical graphs with type LG based on a specific LogicalGraphLayout.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LG createEmptyGraph()
      Creates an empty graph.
      LG fromCollections(Collection<V> vertices, Collection<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph from the given vertex and edge collections.
      LG fromCollections(G graphHead, Collection<V> vertices, Collection<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph from the given single graph head, vertex and edge collections.
      LG fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> graphHead, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph from the given graph head, vertices and edges.
      LG fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices)
      Creates a logical graph from the given vertices.
      LG fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph from the given vertices and edges.
      LG fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHead, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
      Creates a logical graph from the given datasets.
      LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<G,V,E> getLayoutFactory()
      Get the layout factory responsible for creating a graph layout.
      void setLayoutFactory(LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<G,V,E> layoutFactory)
      Sets the layout factory that is responsible for creating a graph layout.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.common.model.api.entities.ElementFactoryProvider

        getEdgeFactory, getGraphHeadFactory, getVertexFactory

      • fromDataSets

        LG fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices,
                org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph from the given vertices and edges. The method creates a new graph head element and assigns the vertices and edges to that graph.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertex DataSet
        edges - Edge DataSet
        Returns:
        Logical graph

      • fromDataSets

        LG fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> graphHead,
                org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices,
                org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph from the given graph head, vertices and edges. The method assumes that the given vertices and edges are already assigned to the given graph head.
        Parameters:
        graphHead - 1-element EPGMGraphHead DataSet
        vertices - Vertex DataSet
        edges - Edge DataSet
        Returns:
        Logical graph

      • fromIndexedDataSets

        LG fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHead,
                       Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices,
                       Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
        Creates a logical graph from the given datasets. The method assumes that all vertices and edges are already assigned to the specified graph head.
        Parameters:
        graphHead - label indexed graph head dataset (1-element)
        vertices - label indexed vertex datasets
        edges - label indexed edge datasets
        Returns:
        Logical graph

      • fromCollections

        LG fromCollections(G graphHead,
                   Collection<V> vertices,
                   Collection<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph from the given single graph head, vertex and edge collections.
        Parameters:
        graphHead - Graph head associated with the logical graph
        vertices - Vertex collection
        edges - Edge collection
        Returns:
        Logical graph

      • fromCollections

        LG fromCollections(Collection<V> vertices,
                   Collection<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph from the given vertex and edge collections. A new graph head is created and all vertices and edges are assigned to that graph.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertex collection
        edges - Edge collection
        Returns:
        Logical graph
